mean_cn: v. （印刷，书写）缩排，切割成锯齿状，定货，印凹痕；  n. 缩进，契约，订货单，凹痕
mean_en: to start (one or more lines of text) farther to the right than other lines of text
word_etyma: in使+dent牙→使成犬牙状，刻成锯齿形
short_phrase: indent the first sentence of a paragraph
sentence: It's a regulation to indent the first sentence of a paragraph when writing an article.
sentence_trans: 在写文章时，缩进每个自然段的第一句话是一个规则。
